description:
Rustic Charmer with Huge Shed!
Offering the feeling of seclusion whilst maintaining a central location, this feel-good well presented
home is ideal for young families, downsizers and investors!
Features Include:
- Light and bright orientation
- Spacious open plan living and dining with coonara heating
- Sizeable bedrooms, 2 with built in robes
- Family bathroom plus powder room
- Tasteful renovations throughout
- Gourmet kitchen with plenty of bench/cupboard space
- Established native gardens
- Sun drenched deck to rear of property
- 9x7 Metre shed from side access to property
- Gas ducted heating and reverse cycle air con
Contact Sean Crimmins for further info

address: Lot 4/33 Lorimer Street Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
LOT 4/33 LORIMER STREET
Nestled in a leafy location of Crib Point, we have six wonderful blocks of land for sale. Only 500m from Esplanade of Crib Point as well as a lovely bush walking track along the coast of Westernport Bay that takes you right through from Stony Point all the way to Hastings. With the boat ramp just down the road and the Westernport Bay surrounding you, this is the perfect spot for fisherman. With big enough blocks to build yourself a lovely family home and still room to store the boat. Land size is -Lot 4: 724m2.

Charming, cozy & convenient
Ideally located, in a secure and private complex this 2 bedroom cottage-style home represents fantastic value for first home buyers, downsizers, investors or anyone after a well presented, modern unit in an even better location.
Boasting an intimate and functional floorplan with neutral tones throughout, the property comprises of the following features:
- Well-appointed kitchen with 600mm gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher and ample amounts of storage space
- Freshly painted open plan kitchen, living and dining area with gas heater and split system heating and cooling
- Two bedrooms with built in robes
- Modern central bathroom with separate shower, bath and vanity
- Low maintenance courtyard area with garden shed and water tank
- Single lock up garage with internal access
- Spacious separate laundry with external access
Located in a leafy and tranquil pocket, you are only moments away from local schools, shops, cafes, sporting clubs and public transport. Don't miss your opportunity to secure this very charming yet contemporary home only moments from all amenities!
Internal area
80m²

Superbly finished, near new family home overlooking Rural setting
Simply, splendid. An extremely rare opportunity to snap up a superbly designed home in a peaceful country location of Crib Point. Tucked away and overlooking acres of rural farm land, this almost brand new home is sure to impress. With no expense spared this three bedroom home has been cleverly designed to incorporate functionality and luxury for a harmonious lifestyle experience.
Upon entry you are graced by a large & welcoming foyer with the extra height of 2.7m ceilings, it is grand first impression. Located to the front is the substantial master suite comprising large walk through his & her robes, en-suite bathroom with double basin vanity, walk in tiled shower & hidden toilet, all very tastefully designed in calming neutral tones. A further two magnificent over-sized bedrooms both with built in robes, positioned to the rear. Off the foyer lies the large laundry room with substantial storage plus large double linen press and internal access through to garage. Further along the entrance foyer you are greeted by the light filled open plan living, dining and lounge area with more space than you know what to do with. The well-appointed kitchen hosts only the best, including 900mm oven & gas stove top, stone bench tops, breakfast bar plus a dream butler's pantry to hide all the mess. Sit back, relax on the couch with a cup of tea and embrace the rural setting that surrounds you and on a cold wintery night enjoy the warmth of the magnificent wood heater . It's an entertaining space that will bring friends and family all together.
This beautiful home really has it all and did we say its almost NEW!
More features include:-
~ Floorboards to living areas
~ Double Glazed windows
~ Security cameras for peace of mind
~ Double garage with remote control and internal access to home
~ Wood fire heating to living, ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout
~ Close to Schools, Transport, New child care facility
~ Lots of parking space & potential to park Caravan/boat down the side.
~ Veggie Patch & Grassed area for the kids to play
It is a must see property that wont disappoint.

A world of living - Great living zone and large courtyard!
This perfectly maintained property has everything you have been looking for and more! Positioned in a quiet and quality complex this 3 Bedroom home is privately secluded and offers fantastic features being the ideal property for anyone looking to downsize, first home buyers or investors.
Upon entry of this stunning home, you are greeted with plenty of natural sunlight in the open plan dining and lounge area, overlooked by the kitchen with ample cupboard space and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher.
This appealing home offers three generous bedrooms, the master with full ensuite & walk in robe, ceiling fan and split system, whilst built in robes complete the second and third bedrooms. A spacious central bathroom, separate toilet and functional laundry having all the fundamentals covered.
Outside you will find a stunning low maintenance garden and large courtyard, which will be perfect for those sunny days to sit outside and enjoy the fresh air or perfect for your family pets. To top it all off, the home has solar power (3.5KW Unit) and a double lock up garage for car accommodation with two further spaces.
Conveniently located in a peaceful and leafy pocket of Crib Point and within minutes to local shops, schools and public transport this is one you can't afford to miss!

Lifestyle, location & luxury
Nestled in a private and tranquil cul-de-sac, this magnificent property with a home of grand proportions offers a lifestyle that will make you the envy of all your family, friends and your soon to be neighbours. Ideally located, this 5 bedroom home offers federation charm with all the modern updates one would require with unique features such as French windows and doors enabling huge amounts of natural light as well as practical and convenient features such as 3 fully renovated bathrooms and butler's pantry.
Offering:
- Open plan living, dining and kitchen area including large wraparound island bench with timber benchtops, 900mm gas cooktop and oven with adjoining butler's pantry
- Generous master bedroom with his and hers walk-in robe with adjoining ensuite including oversized walk-in shower, huge vanity and toilet
- 3 updated bathrooms all with floor to ceiling tiles, oversized walk in showers and the central bathroom also having a bath.
- Side access with a huge shed, ideal for either car, boat, trailer or caravan storage
Offering close proximity to schools, shops, public transport, sporting clubs and yet only moments away from the Mornington Peninsulas' renowned beaches and wineries. A property offering this much character and this tastefully renovated truly needs to be seen to be believed. Renovated period homes such as this are as rare as hens teeth so your immediate inspection is recommended!

Low Maintenance & Spacious!
Situated in leafy, sought after and quiet location, this weatherboard single home in it's own title is the ideal opportunity for those looking to start out, downsize or invest!
Features include:
- 3 Bedrooms with built in robes
- Master bedroom with full ensuite
- Large open plan living and dining areas
- Gourmet kitchen with premium appliance and stone bench top
- Family size bathroom
- Outdoor paved entertaining area
- Double glazed windows
- Single garage with rear access trailer/caravan parking
Contact Sean Crimmins for further information!

Solid Entry Level Opportunity!
Quirky, cozy and well maintained, this solid home is located in a quiet pocket of Crib Point. With a spacious 536sqm secure yard and plenty of space to extend if
desired this is the ideal opportunity for first home buyers, investors and weekenders.
Features Include:
- 2 Sizeable bedrooms
- Ornate ceiling roses
- Polished hardwood floorboards
- Gas wall-furnace
- Open plan living/dining area
- Recently updated kitchen with dishwasher and gas cooking
- Light and bright orientation
- Handy bathroom/laundry combo
- Single carport with room to allow for clear access to backyard
- Secure fencing
- Situated only walking distance from schools, shops, transport and cafes
If you are looking for a very liveable, attractive and affordable entry to the Mornington Peninsula market, this home has to be on your shopping list!

Low Maintenance Lifestyle!
With so much on offer, this property is the obvious choice for investors, retirees and young families looking to secure a piece of Mornington Peninsula paradise close to many beaches.
Set behind secure fencing this well-loved family home showcases the best attributes of low maintenance living on an allotment of 612sqm (approx.) combined with the privacy of a leafy no-thru road. Offering a quiet family retreat, only moments from shops, schools and public transport, the location doesn't get much better than this.
Some of the internal features of this property include:
- Master bedroom with large ensuite and walk-in-robe
- Further 3 bedrooms
- Main family bathroom
- 3 toilets
- Large central kitchen
- Ample cupboard space
- Gas cooking
- Island bench
- Bosch dishwasher
- Two separate living areas
- Gas heating
- Split system air conditioning
This home has room for everyone, including a front lounge and sunken rear family room. Complete with an outdoor entertaining area, outdoor bar and spa, one garden shed for storage, 16 solar panels and two single carports which are ideal to store a boat/caravan, this home has all you need for an excellent lifestyle.
Contact Jason Dowler anytime for further information!

address: 353 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Space, Style And A Sense Of History
Built in an era of master craftsmanship, this beautiful residence has stood the test of time, offering a seamless blend of heritage features and stylish additions on 1,000sqm (approx.)
With so many conveniences so close by it would be difficult to imagine a more desirable location. Only moments to St Joseph's Primary School, transport, HMAS Cerberus Naval Base and the Recreation Reserve.
~ Three spacious bedrooms with built-in-robes, plus a home office or fourth bedroom.
~ Showcasing an idyllic entertainer's layout, a large free-flowing living, dining and kitchen seamlessly extend through glass French doors to a generous alfresco, wrap around verandah and child-friendly lawns.
~ The well-appointed kitchen offers stainless steel cooking appliances, Fisher and Paykel dishwasher and a double fridge cavity.
~ Pulling at the heart strings are an array of period features, including decorative ceilings, sash windows, timber floors and picture rails to artfully display your favourite pieces.
~ Updated main bathroom with a walk-in shower.
~ Climate controlled by ducted heating and cooling, and ceiling fans throughout.
~ Further features include a garden shed and side access to the sizable rear yard, with plenty of space to erect a workshop, carport or swimming pool (S.T.C.A.)

Affordable lifestyle! 1/2 Acre (approx) with huge shed
Positioned in a leafy, peaceful & sought-after locale, this property offers considerable proportions, inside and out! With plenty of room to move the home sits upon a generous allotment of 1980sqm (Approx.) which is just shy of half an acre of pure peninsula paradise!
Features of this home include:
o Light filled kitchen with ample storage
o Dishwasher
o Gas cooktop
o Large formal living room
o Games room
o Climate controlled with split system cooling in living zones
o Ducted heating throughout
o Master bedroom offers ensuite, walk in robe & built in robes
o Remaining bedrooms offer built in robes
o Ceiling fans
o Enclosed alfresco area
o Poolside deck
o Inground swimming pool
o North facing balcony and another overlooking the rear yard
o 60sqm (approx..) shed
Immaculately presented the home offers potential to add your own touch to a few finishes such as flooring however it has been recently refreshed which is evident in its bright and inviting curb & internal appeal.
Call Jason Dowler anytime to inspect the property.

REDUCED PRICE!!!!!!
Where to start! This is the ultimate family home set on approx 873m2 block, this 4 bedroom brick veneer residence makes you feel right at home. You couldn't ask for much more, so here's the list you've been searching for:-
- Large Master suite with generous Ensuite and WIR
- Enormous kitchen with walk in pantry and more storage than you know what to do with
- Vaulted ceilings to lounge & a stunning wood heater for those frosty winter nights
- Three remaining bedrooms all with BIR's
- A walk in linen press to satisfy all your storage needs
- Bungalow/Home office with Split system air-conditioner
- Huge covered & decked entertaining area
- An enviable man-cave perfect for the billiard table and bar
- Extensive front yard with double carport and room for the boat/caravan.
You will be the envy among your family & friends with plenty of room for hosting the big family Christmas or birthday's. Lots of storage in the multiple sheds for all your toys, and a couple of garden beds to satisfy your green thumbs. This property has lots of potential and you cannot go wrong, ready to be loved by a new family this property is exceptional value.
Located in a quiet street only minutes away from the boat ramp, stony point ferry, schools, local shops and transport and a shorty drive to award winning wineries and restaurants, Crib Point has it all!
Contact Richard Whitehead on 0412 328 718 for further details.

Peaceful & Private - Crib Point Village
Hidden amongst 1060m2 of bushy gardens, this solid 3-bedroom home is located at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac, and offers a private, peaceful lifestyle.
Internal features of this well-maintained home include:
- Updated kitchen with gas cooking, pantry, plenty of cupboard space and adjoining meals area.
- 3 generous bedrooms all with built in robes.
- Updated bathroom.
- Fresh neutral tones, original hard wood floorboards, new carpet and timber blinds.
- Gas heating and split system air-conditioning.
- Generous family lounge.
Outside offers plenty of outdoor space for children and pets, an outdoor undercover area, single carport, garden shed, water tank and side access to the rear of the property.
Within close proximity to Stony Point boat ramp and Phillip Island Ferry; and walking distance to public transport, local shops, schools, HMAS Cerberus & just a short 15 minutes to popular surf/ocean beaches such as Point Leo & Shoreham.
This property is perfect for first homeowners, couples, singles, young families, lifestyle enthusiasts & investors and those looking to downsize.

address: Lot 3/97 Disney Street Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Perfect New Home Block!
At 650 square metres (approx) with a northerly aspect, this block is the ideal site for your first home, family home or investment! All services are available and a crossover is already built. Mature trees add to your street appeal, along with an existing fence. Dimensions are 25.76 x 25.23.
Contact Sean Crimmins for further info and a copy of the Section 32!

Invest in the Best!
By Appointment Only | When only the best will do; this modern unit will appeal to investors looking for a profitable investment opportunity.
Ideally located within easy walking distance to the town centre and Morradoo Railway Station, and a 2-minute drive to "The Esplanade" coastal walking trail.
~ Three bedrooms; master with a full ensuite.
~ Spacious, open plan lounge and dining area, accompanied by a modern kitchen with a breakfast bar, double fridge cavity and stainless steel appliances.
~ Ducted heating throughout.
~ Lovely outdoor patio with low maintenance gardens.
~ Double remote-controlled garage.
* The dishwasher and air-conditioning unit in the master bedroom are not included in the sale.

Happy Days On Howell
Ideal for those seeking space for the whole family to enjoy, this wonderful home offers huge potential and versatility on approximately 996sqm.
Set in the heart of Crib Point, within easy walking distance to shops, Dartnell Reserve and Morradoo Station.
~ Master bedroom with walk-in-robe, ensuite, ceiling fan and split system heating & cooling.
~ Three remaining bedrooms are all spacious.
~ A sizable, hostess kitchen featuring a Westinghouse oven, dishwasher, breakfast bar and plenty of cupboards & bench space.
~ The dining area leads to an entertainer's alfresco and established gardens.
~ A spacious lounge room consisting of high ceilings, gas log fire, ceiling fan and split system heating & cooling for year round comfort.
~ The second living zone can be utilised as a games room or fifth bedroom.
~ Outdoor features include a double carport, storage shed and a private front fence with an electric gate.

Rare Investment Opportunity
A rare opportunity exists for an astute builder/investor to complete this 2 part subdivision and reap the benefits. This property includes an existing tenanted dwelling currently returning $1608 PCM. The existing house located on the front lot of the property consists of 4 bedrooms, a good size lounge with dado wall paneling, separate meals area overlooking the kitchen with upright gas cooker & dishwasher. Recently renovated laundry, bathroom & large ensuite with spa bath. Other features include ducted heating and air conditioning in the lounge and a carport which can accommodate 2 cars in tandem on a 543m2 (approx) allotment whilst the rear planned subdivision is 684m2(approx). Total of approx 1227m2. To find out more, please contact the Agent.

Immaculate Unit With Plenty Of Space And North-Facing Aspect
OPEN HOME CANCELLED | Wonderfully private and full of sunshine, this modern unit offers an easy breezy, low maintenance lifestyle with everything you need just a level walk away. Boutique shops, transport and leading schools are all counted as neighbours.
~ Spacious master bedroom with built-in-robes and ensuite.
~ Two remaining bedrooms, one of which features a built-in-robe.
~ The open plan lounge and dining area flows through to a private courtyard.
~ Modern kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, Blanco dishwasher and plenty of cupboards and bench space.
~ Ducted heating throughout.
~ Double garage with internal access + visitors car park.

Quandong Cottage.
Nestled amongst the bushy established gardens on a generous 689m2 block, this quintessential 3-bedroom cottage offers a private retreat in the quiet town of Crib Point.
Sheltered by expansive verandahs and where lovely garden views can be enjoyed from every room, the open plan integrates family and dining room, renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and pantry. The adjoining undercover deck is ideal for entertaining family and friends and provides a tranquil space to sit, relax and take in the fresh air.
Further features of this charming home include:
3 bedrooms including master bedroom with renovated ensuite.
Renovated main bathroom.
Gas ducted heating, split system air-conditioning, ceiling fans.
A separate studio which can be utilized as a 4th bedroom, guest room or home office.
Double carport, powered workshop/double lock up garage and plenty of off-street parking.
Set in a quiet convenient location; opposite the sporting reserve and swimming pool; walking distance to local schools and public transport; a short drive will have you arrive at beautiful swimming beaches and Shopping Centre.
Suitable for first home buyers, downsizers, investors or those looking for an affordable holiday hideaway.

Country Charm On 1/4 Acre (Approx.)
Delivering complete serenity amidst birdsong thanks to a generous 1,011sqm allotment (approx,) this endearing home presents you with the quiet lifestyle you crave in the location you desire.
Only a short commute to Bittern Fields Shopping Complex, Dartnell Reserve and public transport; everything you could possibly need is at your fingertips.
~ Master bedroom with robes, ceiling fan and ensuite.
~ Two remaining bedrooms with robes.
~ A spacious, functional kitchen with Dishlex dishwasher, breakfast bar and plenty of storage.
~ Lounge and dining space with air-conditioning and gas heating.
~ Lovely outdoor entertaining area boasting a pot-belly heater, overlooking established gardens, veggie patches and child friendly lawns.
~ Side access to a 6x12 shed with power.
~ Further features include a double carport, 5kw solar panels, garden shed and water tank for garden use.
